scripts.deploy: forge build && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:DeployScript --rpc-url ${0:-default_network} --broadcast --legacy && node script/generateTsAbis.js
scripts.deploy:verify: forge build && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:DeployScript --rpc-url ${0:-default_network} --broadcast --verify --legacy && node script/generateTsAbis.js
